content: links of color wrap/shawl finished size approximately 70 wide x 47 tall size-small through xl can easily be made bigger by adding row worked from bottom up materials 12 ounces 3-four ounce skeins 95 yards each skein red heart bright and lofty super bulky-mine was done in licorice can be made with any super bulky yarn or two strands of worsted weight yarn held together p 11 1/2mm hook yarn needle for weaving in ends basic stitches chain chain single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet skill level easy pattern row 1 chain 8 double_crochet in first chain chain 6 and turn row 2 - double_crochet in loop formed in previous row chain 3 double_crochet in third chain from previous row chain 6 turn row 3-30 repeat row 2 until 30 row are completed you will have an increase of one loop for each row finishing at end of row 30 chain 1 do 1 single_crochet evenly spaced around the three sides of wrap fasten_off and weave in ends three skeins of yarn were used for this size to make xxl or larger additional skeins will have to be purchased this can be tied in the front pinned or worn as is this pattern and all its contents are ©copyrighted january 2006 to deneen st amour and may not be copied reproduced in any way or used for profit in any way pattern is for your personal use only you may sell the finished item for any assistance with the pattern you may contact me at yarnsandmusings@gmail com
